com.choinoski.persistence

Class GenericDao<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.choinoski.persistence.GenericDao<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type parameter

    public class GenericDao<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic DAO somewhat inspired by http://rodrigouchoa.wordpress.com
